text:
-vaina#M dEqvatEqjyamA#nAq BUtyA# indhEq vasI#yAn Bavati saM~Mvathsaqrasya# paqrastA#daqgnayE$ vraqtapa#tayE purOqDASa#maqShTAka#pAlaqM nirva#pEth saM~MvathsaqramEqvaina#M ~MvRuqtraM ja#GniqvA(gm) sa#maqgni-rvraqtapa#ti-rvraqtamA la#mBayatiq tatO&dhiq kAma#M ~MyajEta || 26 
(EqtAM - ta - daudu#mbaraq(gg)q - svA - triq(gm)qSacca# )(A4)
